page.title: 12PRESS RESERVOIR
page.content: In the North_East corner of the parish of Ashover is Press Reservoirs.I live by them and my father is responsible for looking after them.There are two huts by our house and they were built in 1890,and so they have been there for 95 years. The biggest reservoir is 4.46 acres in area (1:80 hectares.)and the smallest reservoir is 3.125 acres (1.35 hectares) .All the reservoirs put together hold 31,000,000 gallons.The three reservoirs put together cover 1.6 hectares and their catchment area is 202 hectares.The reservoirs are now used for fly fishing and lots of people come to fish.There are also a lot of wild and nesting birds around them and it is becoming an important wild life area.
